scripts.build: pnpm -filter @sentry/sentry-subgraph-client run build && pnpm -r -filter !web-staking -filter !@sentry/sentry-subgraph-client -filter !@sentry/sentry-subgraph run build
scripts.cli: pnpm -filter @sentry/core run build && pnpm -r -filter @sentry/sentry-node-cli run compile && pnpm -r -filter @sentry/sentry-node-cli run start
scripts.deploy-smart-contracts: pnpm -r -filter @sentry/core run build && pnpm -r -filter @sentry/smart-contracts run deploy
scripts.desktop: pnpm -filter @sentry/web-connect run build && pnpm -r -filter @sentry/sentry-client-desktop run dev
